name: SKPhysicsJoint
desc: The abstract superclass for objects that connect physics bodies.

items.name: var bodyA: SKPhysicsBody
items.desc: The first body connected by the joint.

items.name: var bodyB: SKPhysicsBody
items.desc: The second body connected by the joint.

items.name: var reactionForce: CGVector
items.desc: The instantaneous reaction force, in newtons, currently being directed at the anchor point.

items.name: var reactionTorque: CGFloat
items.desc: Instantaneous reaction torque, in newton-meters, currently being directed at the anchor point.
